summary: Simple, non-overpowered damage over time spells.
descriptionHtml:
Simple, non-overpowered damage over time spells.The convenient light shows you whether or not the spell is active on an enemy. You can find all three tomes in the Braidwood Inn at Kynesgrove, South of Winterhold. Works well in conjunction with fire spells to increase damage.

There are three spells, one each for low, medium, and high levels. They are not overpowered but they are quite useful! 

As far as compatibility goes, they should work with just about anything out there. 

You can also download this mod from the steam workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=127939768

Check out my other mod, Anga\'s Mill enhanced: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31753

Check out SlumpVirus\'s Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/SlumpVirus/featured
author: SkildNinja
